titleInfo.title: Inter-Religious Negotiations: Case Studies on Students' Perception of and Dealing With Religious Diversity
Towards Religious Competence. Diversity as a Challenge for Education in Europe

bibliographicCitation.wels: Streib, H. (2001): Inter-Religious Negotiations: Case Studies on Students' Perception of and Dealing With Religious Diversity. In: Hans-Günter Heimbrock; Christoph T. Scheilke; Peter Schreiner (Hrsg.): Towards Religious Competence. Diversity as a Challenge for Education in Europe. Münster: Lit Verlag. (Schriften aus dem Comenius-Institut, 3). S. 129-149.
bibliographicCitation.frontiers: Streib, H. (2001). “Inter-Religious Negotiations: Case Studies on Students' Perception of and Dealing With Religious Diversity” in Towards Religious Competence.
